Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: numRows
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The number of table rows. A dynamic counter to track the progress of the table build.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: gridMode
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The grid mode, this determines the number of columns

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: colDefs
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Container for the column definitions

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: rowDefs
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Container for the row definitions

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: cellDefs
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Container for the cell definitions

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: numberOfCOLS
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The number of table columns. A dynamic integer decided by the size of the data array

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: newRailClass
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: New var for manipulating init parameter railClass

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: hasFlights
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the tour have any flights?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: latesBanner
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the grid need a Late Departures banner?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: regDeps
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the tour have regional departures?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: flyHome
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the grid need any Fly:Home option boxes?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: doubleYearMode
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the data to be formatted cover two years?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: discardTourTitle
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Do we want to discard the tour title (used for tactical brochures)

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: yearOne
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The first year in the date range

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: yearTwo
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The second year in the date range (if the range covers two years)

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: data
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: The data array

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: NSS
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the tour have a No Single Supplement offer?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: hasStandardClassDepartures
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Does the tour have Standard Class departures?

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: buldGrid(tourTitle:duration:departureLocation:tourCode:railClass:rdl:rdp:smallPrint:deposit:singlesupp:LatesPanel:HasFlights:RegDeps:FlyHome:DoubleYearMode:DiscardTourTitle:YearOne:YearTwo:data:HasStandardClassDepartures:firstClassValue:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Builds a price grid by reading in a header file, building the price grid, closing the table using another file and finally replaceing placeholder data in the output with a search-replace.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: buildIDMLGrid(gridSize:doubleYear:removeTourTitle:latesBanner:regionalDepartures:hasFlights:flyHome:yearOne:yearTwo:Data:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Builds the central data grid based upon data passed to it. Depending upon the data contained and the options provided, it can provide a 2, 3 or 4 column grid with or without Fly:Home option, regional departures, tour titles, standard class rail options in a combination of one or two year layouts. in the case of a 3 column grid, only a 1 year layout applies. It automatially calculates the required number of columns dependent on the nomber of rows that are required. These are set as thresholds that once passed, signals the requirement for a larger grid, although these are overridden if the tour has two years or standard class departures. It returns a string containing IDML code and content to be effectivly ‘sandwiched’ between the contents of two ‘include’ files.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addColumns(gridsize:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: Builds the Column definitions for the IDML output according to the required grid size. The width of the columns are statically assgned as IDML parameters to ensure that the table output is always 94mm wide on page.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addTourTitle(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the tour title element of the table

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addLatesBanner(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the ‘Lates Banner’ element of the table

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addDepartureLocationTourCode(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the departure location element of the table, this element will also house the tour code and the visa information.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addDepartureYears(row:colSpan:doubleYear:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the tour departure years header element of the table

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addRailClass(row:colSpan:doubleYear:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the tour rail class header element of the table

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addDeparture(row:leftStrokeColor:colStart:monthValue:dayValue:priceValue:cellColor:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for one departure. This function allows specification for various options such as stroke and fill colours. it retuns a configured block of three cells.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addFlyHomeOption(row:colSpan:doubleYear:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for fly:home option cells

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addRegionalDepartureLocations(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for regional departures locations option row

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addRegionalDeparturePrices(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for regional departures option supplement prices row

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addSpacer(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for a spacer row, this type of row will alway be spanned across all columns and be exactly 1.035mm high

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addDepositArea(row:colSpan:content:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the deposit area. this will contain the single supplement and the deposit as well as other supplementory information

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addSmallPrint(row:colSpan:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the small print element of the table

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addTableDef(rows:cols:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for the table definition. This specifies all options in IDML for the table including columns & rows

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addRowDef(ownID:name:textTopInset:textLeftInset:textBottomInset:textRightInset:clipContentToTextCell:singleRowHeight:minimumHeight:autoGrow:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for a row definition. IDML requires that the row definitions are listed before the cell definitions, unlike HTML where cell definition is implicit. This means that row definitions, although created dynamically, are stored in a seperate holding variable at the top level of the class, then added to the output before the cell definitions

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addColDef(ownID:name:textTopInset:textLeftInset:textBottomInset:textRightInset:clipContentToTextCell:singleColumnWidth:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for column definition.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: endTable()
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for column definition.

Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.name: addCell(ownID:name:rowSpan:colSpan:cellType:textTopInset:textLeftInset:textBottomInset:textRightInset:appliedCellStyle:appliedParagraphStyle:appliedCharacterStyle:content:)
Classes/idmlGenerator.html#/s:15GreatPri.abstract: builds and returns the IDML required for cell definition.
